website_summaries.verdict: Quality lightweight pajamas at an affordable price.
pros: Made of a lightweight material that's comfortable for pooches and perfect for wear in warmer weather
The fit is soft and flexible and material doesn't tend to bunch or bind
Available in numerous sizes and at a reasonable price point
cons: Pajamas run on the small side
Occasional crooked seams and loose threads reported

customer_reviews.title: Good value overall
customer_reviews.text: 12 lb. Shih Tzu/Bichon, 17.5” neck base to tail, 17” chest circumference; ordered size large. Fits well though front sleeves appear to be shorter than back. Quality is fair - loose threads and uneven stitching. No fabric or care labels/instructions provided. We machine washed gentle and hung dry without issue.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but a bit rough in the inside
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, they were cute on right size, but the seam in the legs was rough and hard on the inside which I never noticed until my dog turned around the other day and had a huge,deep cut on his hind left leg and one that was identical starting on the right side.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C.

customer_reviews.title: Right Size but Wrong Fit for Small Whippet
customer_reviews.text: Really sad that I had to send this back - it' very cute and the material is soft and good quality from what I could tell. However, it didn't fit my whippet mix (size of Italian greyhound) - the size was right, but the fit was wrong. The chest area was good if a bit short, but the back was too big and kept sliding over his tail and down his legs. For dogs that are normal proportion and don't have the bulky chest and thin backend, it's probably great and I would have kept it if my other dog of a different breed was the same size.
customer_reviews.author: R. Spiky

customer_reviews.title: Cute and served the purpose of hiding surgical incision site while healing
customer_reviews.text: My 8 pound yorkie recently had surgery for fluxating patella, resulting in about a 5 inch incision on her rear left leg. After the bandages came off, hair started growing in and the incision scab was drying. This resulted in her trying to "scratch an itch" so to speak. I needed something that fit loosely and was comfortable, while at the same time covered the incision site so she couldn't worry it. In addition to a soft collar, these pjs did the trick. I got the small as she measured into a small and it did fit nicely. Soft and cute. I would, and did, order another product from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Denise E.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but Small fitting.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this because my 50lb Jindo mix gets cold easy, but even as an extra extra large with accurate measurements, this product came out too small. Super tight around her back knees and front armpits. However overall it is super cute I just wish it fit more proper for my baby girl.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite for my little Moe
customer_reviews.text: My furbaby is 4.9 pounds and at first I ordered XS but it was very snug (because he has very thick fur and it was a little too short, he's 10"L). I returned for S and it fits perfect, if that helps to get an idea of sizing. I've had it on him all day and kept it on overnight and his leg only came out once. I just love this outfit! It's a quality thin long John sweater feel and so far appears to be good quality stitching. If they have other colors I'll definitely buy more. Color is true to pics and the cute little pocket is adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Erin J.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seems to be made well and covers his hot spots until we can get him to the vet to see why he's pulling his hair out so bad. I would recommend the product. If you follow the simple to follow instructions on how to measure your fur baby you will have no issues there as far as how it fits on your pooch.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Bought a Large 9 lbs, 16 inch chest, 11 inch neck, 13.5 inches long
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1 size up as my puppy is not full grown. He is a 4 month old Boston Terrier weighing in around 9 lbs. His 11 inch neck, 16 inch chest, and 13.5 inches long. We bought a size Large. I am looking for some longevity and he is growing quite a bit still. The biggest issue at the moment is the tail end covers his bum entirely. This could create a disturbing poop situation. Also came with previous animal hair on it. I know people return items, but at least run a lint roller over it!
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My poodle chews his skin obsessively, but a lightweight sweater stops him completely. This is perfect for him, not too thick or hot, but good coverage so that he doesn’t chew. He is 15 years old and I love that the sweater goes with his old man persona. He is 8 pounds and I ordered a medium, but I think when I reorder I will go for a large.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Clark

customer_reviews.title: Out of his collection of 30 outfits, this is his favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. I have a hairless Chinese Crested who definitely does not enjoy the 20-30 degree weather during winter in my area. These pajamas are perfect for him. He has a collection of over 30 outfits, and these are the pjs I put on him on a daily basis. They don’t ever irritate his skin from rubbing. They are lightweight enough to wear around the house, but also keep him warm enough to go outside. (He refuses to go outside if he doesn’t have something on to keep him warm)
customer_reviews.author: Gibby

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my “old man” Maltese. He gets cold so quickly and I just wanted to keep it somewhat warm and cozy during these cold Fall and Winter months. He love it and stays cozy! He’s, like I stated, a Maltese. He’s almost 10 now and weighs about 15 pounds. I ordered the large based on the sizing chart and some other reviews and it fits him perfectly! If you have a larger dog, this won’t be the right buy for you, sadly. But if you have a dog about the same size as my boy, definitely get the large! And then be prepared for the cuteness overload!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel R

customer_reviews.title: They cover dogs bum bum - bad
customer_reviews.text: My single star rating is such because the fit 100% covers my dog’s rear entirely. I have a medium size Boston (19 lbs). The size medium was too small for him. The size large fit him perfect, but the way the article is cut, his bum is completely covered. I suppose this would be something to (inconveniently) work around if he were monitored all the time, but in our family, our pups run in and out through their dog door at their leisure so this cannot work. This company does ship the product very quickly and has a great return policy I will say.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Stocksdale

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit and too small even when buying 2 sizes up!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the XXL which the description states is for dogs 18” back & 23” chest. My dog is a 16” back & 22” chest and this was STILL a little too tight, pulled on the legs and the neckline pulled down her neck into her shoulders. Even when I adjusted the legs and pulled them up, as soon as she started walking around, the entire garment would ride down and the neckline would pull down into her shoulders again. The fabric was VERY thin and really more for cuteness than warmth. Overall, the design is kind of a weird fit and the sizes run at least 2-3 sizes small.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love It! But for smaller dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this onesie! It’s super cute! I have a 50lb Mini staffy pitbull (see photo) and she’s such an odd shape that I can Never find onesies that fit her. I bought the XXL and this was Just right. It fits her like a glove, a semi-tight glove but the material is pretty stretchy so she’s comfortable. I accidentally ordered two and one of the butt pockets seams arrived unraveling (see photo) Kinda thin/cheap material but cute and great price!
customer_reviews.author: S E P

customer_reviews.title: Beware sizes
customer_reviews.text: Be aware sizes are completely wrong. My dodie wears a medium from every other store on the planet I ordered him a medium and it is so small it doesn’t even fit my Chihuahua and the extra large I ordered for my bigger dog is also too small for my Dixie so not even an extra large fits a medium dog and of course it’s too late to return and get for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Raimee Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, warm, and he really likes them! (when the tail's waggin', you know he's happy!).
customer_reviews.text: I love these jammies! My dog, who is a 5 yr. old Chihuahua, seems to love 'em too!! I got a size XL, which was just a tiny tad too large, but I think maybe after a wash, they may fit him just right. These jammies are just so darned cute! I KNOW I'll be back to buy more. Shipping was SUPER fast, packaged great.... the whole buying experience was wonderful. Thanks again!!
customer_reviews.author: Filippa Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Tight around the bottom area
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 4 star because it's so adorable but I had to return it because its was tight around my dogs bottom he's a miniature greyhound and he was walking funny and I knew it didn't fit him right, if the elastic was loose and not so tight it would be a 5 perfect.. The quality of the item is really good. Same goes with any Fitwarm PJ's.
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Muniz

customer_reviews.title: Cuteness overload!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg if this isn’t the cuties thermal I have ever put my dog in..... it came in super fast, and I just love it. My old man (11yr old shitzuh) Didn’t hate me putting this on him because the stretch was great, the feel is not scratchy, and too heavy, it’s perfect!! He’s about 12-15 lbs so I ordered him a large didn’t think it fit this good, it fits PERFECTLY and he’s short and the legs don’t look like they will come out at all.very happy with my purchase and will be ordering more. Another on the way already.
customer_reviews.author: Ezmel1188

customer_reviews.title: Generally good product - this one may have a design flaw
customer_reviews.text: The item I received had a design flaw. One item was much shorter than the other. They accepted the return no questions asked even though I discovered the problem after I had already washed it. My dog has a whole wardrobe of fitwarm brand clothes and we love them so I’m sure this was just a fluke!! LOVE THiS seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Mischa

customer_reviews.title: S fits 5lb chihuahua - so cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest! Keeps my sweetie warm at night. Doesn’t pull or tighten uncomfortably with movement. (I also got some pajamas by the same company that are just cotton T-shirt material but it pulls on his short for and over time gets tight around the neck because of the pulling)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: BUY FITWARM
customer_reviews.text: Love fitwaem for puppy clothes!! Mine only gripe with this outfit is the patch is just offcenter enough that it kind of looks unintentional. Other than that so cute!!! My 8 lb Jack chi wears a size medium. His front legs are slightly far apart and the small seems to rub a little (I might be crazy and just thought it would bother him so I sized up)
customer_reviews.author: CC@amazon

customer_reviews.title: His favorite pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my best friends dog and he LOVES them. The second you put them on, he goes right to sleep. He hates to sleep without clothes but easily gets too hot at night so this was perfect for him AND he looks ADORABLE. He is about 10lbs but is long and it fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: It's cute
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is confusing especially with so many reviews stating it runs small. I have a 23 lb frenchie who's back measures 20 inches so I went with the sellers guideline of xxl. It's baggy on her. I double checked after I put it on her. I had to fold up the back legs a bit. I'm hoping it will shrink in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: ncwren

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Stretchy material and not cheap. Oredered a medium for my 6 pound baby and fits great. It’s good for sleeping or to use while out shopping. He seems to like it. Only negative thing is it had a strange smell so I aired it out and problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline C.

customer_reviews.title: Very very thin material but very cute
customer_reviews.text: these are so adorable on my little guy, but paper thin and literally transparent. He has a lot of thick, fleece clothes, so having some that are breathable is kind of nice. These would be useless trying to keep your dog warm when it is really really cold, but if you have a dog that is nervous and likes the pressure of clothes for anxiety or you want something light- these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Snags very easily
customer_reviews.text: Love the lightweight material. But it snags so badly that after one use it is unusable. So I had to toss it in garbage
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Not the thickest, but merchant has thicker!
customer_reviews.text: A little lighter weight than I had hoped for. But luckily the same merchant has thicker items for the cold days. I think I should have ordered an XL, it’s a little snug. Model is 20lbs, wearing a L, and loves meat treats, cuddles, and exploring dog parks.
customer_reviews.author: Harrisonite

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the picture but it’s a bit smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute, fits my little old man pretty okay. This is a size medium. He is a miniature poodle. So beware of the sizing. It fits him, but I wanted it looser for him for comfort. I wish I had ordered a large now but that seemed too big when I checked the size chart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pjs for dog
customer_reviews.text: This was more for my amusement then it was for anything else. It was pretty thin material so wouldn’t keep warm outside in the cold. It fit well and was very adorable on my dog, even if he was less than amused
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Very small, very thin.  Wont wear it.
customer_reviews.text: Meh..... Very thin material. Also, I always buy my 4lb Yorkie XS clothes, but according to the size chart, I needed to order a small. I did. It is still very small. Like, my clothes loving baby won't wear it and just stands there stiff like it is extremely uncomfortable for him.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Galligher

customer_reviews.title: For me they run true to size.
customer_reviews.text: These are just so adorable but they didn't fit my fur baby. I have a chipoo who is 12 lbs and 12"long. Because some reviews said they ran small I bought the large but the neck was so big that his foot went partway out of them on his first step. His foot was just stuck. I'm returning them to buy a medium. To me they run true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Hot mess

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. Thin material, breathable, and very soft. Well sewn and good quality. It looks like it will last and not too pricey versus going to a petsmart/Petco for dog clothes. Will buy from this label again for my 11 lb Pomeranian.
customer_reviews.author: anonymity

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was not what I expected. I have a medium size yorkie. He is 12lbs and normally a small. This small was so tiny it was choking his legs and it’s a extremely light. I bought this to keep him warm since he gets cold easily but it’s not warm at ALL. See the pic to see how see through it is. RETURNING ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Momlife4

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in 2 sizes for both of my dogs. They are perfect! Keeps them warm without being too warm - no shocks from static electricity! And they look adorable! My girls are usually so hard to fit - deep chests and long bodies but these are working out great - will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Mad readers

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Not thrilled with it. Fabric is fairly thin, and probably won't last that long. The stitch patch on the back goes through both layers of the "pocket". Looks like it was stitched on as an afterthought. Wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Extra Small is REALLY tiny.
customer_reviews.text: The extra small is too small. It wont fit a 22 week old hairless cat. I'm assuming these run small but I gave it a good review because I didnt pay attention to the dimensions. My fault. It looks like it would be nice if it fit him. Good material and super cute. Definitely dont assume the extra small will fit any small animal. Only certain teeny tiny animals.
customer_reviews.author: ciara nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Comfy sleepwear
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and cute sleepwear. When I removed the item from the packaging it had a funny odor. I washed it and it was good. It fit my 13 lb yorkie
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Wojo

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and color
customer_reviews.text: I've had success with buying dog clothes online, but this wasn't the case. The quality and color of the fabric is not great. I would return this if it wasn't such a hassle...
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not very good quality
customer_reviews.text: My frenchie is 30 lbs, and I got him size XXL (his measurements were close to the size chart). It fits well, but when we put these pj’s on for the first time - threads were sticking out from the leg holes... Had to cut the threads off, so I won’t be surprised if it will fall apart soon. However, it’s nice for sleeping and my pup seems to be enjoying it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Love these jammies!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nicholas loves his new jammies! He weighs 10 to 11 lbs and typically hates clothes and will just just stand still and stare at me when I put clothes on him; There are few exceptions, like walking in the snow. He doesn’t seem to mind these at all. The quality is great and I will buy this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Runs super small
customer_reviews.text: I had to send this back, had purchased for my cat, but my cat apparently is MUCH bigger than small dogs! Way too small, he could have worn it as a hat. Too bad, it was really cute! The quality seemed nice.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Cute for my chinese crested but more for fall or spring
customer_reviews.text: Cute for my chinese crested but more for fall or spring.. Not very warm. My chinese cresteds would freeze in NJ winter.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: It's great! It's stretchy around the arms & legs so ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is about 10 lbs, he has a wide ribcage so I ordered a Medium size for him. It's great! It's stretchy around the arms & legs so it doesn't cut off his circulation. It's really soft and soo cute!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for larger dogs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a XXL for my 7 month old pit bull puppy. Wish larger sizes were an option. Fits wonky around the neck after wearing for awhile. Outfit is very lightweight and made of soft fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and she wore for a few hours and it started to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Trodgers0729

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: It's way too small. I think I'd need an extra large for my small dog. It didn't even fit over my dogs head. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: DamWife

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Doggy
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Followed sizing chart and product was much too small. Product quality also questionable. Certainly expected more.
customer_reviews.author: kentucky newsman

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: Really cute.. not as thick as the others I have reviewed but very cute! Not too hot I believe and not as soft as their other products!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! My dog is a Yorkie he weight barely 9lbs. I bought a medium, it fits great, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stubby dogs only!
customer_reviews.text: This is just ok. I have a 12 pound shih-poo. He is long like a sigh-tzu and this (even though I got him a medium) was not long enough. It fit around great. If I sized up 1 would be too big around. Probably best for short torso dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey D.

customer_reviews.title: Muslin like cotton
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It’s thinner muslin like cotton. Perfect for upcoming Spring days where my 7lb chihuahua’s sweater pjs are too thick, but he still needs a little warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are great and lightweight. Only issue, I wish I would have ordered a large. Even after measuring, the medium is a little tight. I have a 14 lb Boston terrier.
customer_reviews.author: L_K

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Its TINY! My small dog wouldn't fit in the medium size. What are the sizes for...rodents; Not actual dogs!
customer_reviews.author: TT2u

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Dont beleive the size chart. Order by weight. My 5 lb Chihuahua was wide enough for a large but nit long enough. Dont order suze up for in betweens as instructed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these clothes!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fitwarm dog clothes for my two dogs. I have a 4 lb Matlipoo and an 8 lb Morkie that both wear a size small. The legs are a bit long on them for the Morkie since he has shorter legs but work great for the Maltipoo. These are well made and last through many washes. Would hight recommend these clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Don't fit.
customer_reviews.text: I tried 2 sizes they didn't fit and i bought a couple of them. I took a loss I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Great pjs.
customer_reviews.text: Great, breathable, and adorable pjs. I tell my boy no one could work long johns the way he does (they look like long johns). Very nice material, fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal H

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but sizes run VERY SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Its cute as can be but very small. I ordered a medium and it could have probably fit an extra small to small dog. I had to return it because of that, but it was adorable and seemed to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Bozeman

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made but it runs small My dog is about 10lbs but slim, I got the medium and it fits kind of tight and a little stiff. I would probably order it again but in a size up. The material is thin and screechy but not enough. It’s very cute though.
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Not made well
customer_reviews.text: I buy pjs for my two babies every year these fit but my dogs hate them and wiggle till they get out of them
customer_reviews.author: Granny Z

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Light, cute, soft. Note that this model is thinner than other dog pajamas. So, cute layer but not necessarily for purpose of use in colder weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! It runs smaller. I have a yorkie and this was to small for him .
customer_reviews.author: Randy & Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit my awkward size dog
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product just doesn’t fit my awkward dog. She’s shaped like a mini greyhound but a bit bigger (she a mutt possible mini poodle mix).
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Your fur baby feels like a baby-baby (dog parents get it)
customer_reviews.text: They are really great for outings! This onsie is warm and fits great under his snow coat. When I hold him he feels like a real baby in it! It's adorable! Please make to get the right size. If you have a small dog, get a size small. This one runs big.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Dawn Helwig

customer_reviews.title: Too cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and warm. Make sure you measure your pet to get the exact size. Had to exchange for a bigger size for my 7lb chihuahua.
customer_reviews.author: Beachymommy

customer_reviews.title: Another great design
customer_reviews.text: Love to dress up my lil pup. He is a morkie (8lbs) he looks so cute with this onsie. The small patch with logo is a nice tough including small little pockets on the back
customer_reviews.author: Jasper Acosta

customer_reviews.title: For my Jack Russell
customer_reviews.text: I love it my 13 pound Jack Russell looks so adorable and i know that the pjs will be just enough to keep her warm but not uncomfortable only thing that seems like it bothers is the end pushes her tail down and under overall a great product though
customer_reviews.author: sarah morgan

customer_reviews.title: Nice pjs
customer_reviews.text: Fits my hairless dog pretty well. He is about 25lbs, mini (middle size) xoloitzcuintli and I ordered the XXL. He normally wears large in Petco clothing. Its very stretchy and a light fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Keehan

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this in a XL which normally fits my pit bull which is a small pit bull 65 lbs. I would need to order 2 sizes up. Fits my cat
customer_reviews.author: mdj

customer_reviews.title: love fitwarm
customer_reviews.text: a little thinner than I expected, but love this brand and will continue to buy from them, my Chinese crested weighs approx 8-10lbs wears a medium
customer_reviews.author: Kandi Queen-Ricci

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small. Super cute but I have a 20 shih tzu that could be an Xl
customer_reviews.text: I have a 20lbs shih tzu and Could have gotten an Xl and it might of been a little loser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute outfit!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute outfit, a little thinner then I thought it would be but it fits nicely and seems to keep my dog warm, also I like the stretch on it since my small dog is a little longer in the body then other Maltese’s. Would buy again in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My teacup poodle is completely adorable in this well-fitting little suit
customer_reviews.text: My teacup poodle is completely adorable in this well-fitting little suit. Love this company!! We have everything they make that fits a teacup poodle in XXS.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Dog hated it
customer_reviews.text: Chihuahua hated it. Would be out of it in 10 minutes. Cost to much to return.
customer_reviews.author: Denim Momma

customer_reviews.title: Me owww
customer_reviews.text: As this was for my cat I needed to sew the neckline a little smaller but other then that this fits beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Not for all dogs
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!! Not way my dog walk with that on. Extremely big
customer_reviews.author: alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my pomeranian
customer_reviews.text: The medium fits perfectly on my 6lb Pomeranian. He gets cold easily since he is so skinny, so these definitely help keep him warm while inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty and perfect fit for my yorkie he is 11 pounds
customer_reviews.author: J Martinez

customer_reviews.title: True to size.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They fit true to size and are so cute on my pup.
customer_reviews.author: Sara zollinger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Jammies
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME!!! I just received them yesterday & washed them before I put them on my little guy & they are super soft. I went back & ordered him 6 more pairs!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Don't get this if your dog has a docked tail!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a little nubby tail and this outfit covered up his butt so I'm not sure how going potty would work but I'm not about to try and find out the hard way. Too bad because it's adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Runs very small,more a size S not M that I ordered.having problems to send back to purchase larger size.other than the size product is very nice. That's why I want to return for larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Pammie

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE outfit for chilly weather
customer_reviews.text: Thanks you guys!!! It’s AWESOME outfit, so comfortable! Bought size XS for 6 lb Yorkie - fit is perfect. Material feels natural.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I have many different pajamas for my dog, but these are definitely her favorite. She actually runs to me when she sees me holding them!
customer_reviews.author: C.A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Musty, mildew smell
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two different pairs of pjs. One was fine however this one had a terrible musty, mildew smell. It took soaking in oxy clean and 3 washes to get the smell out. The leather patch on the back bled in the wash and made a brown stain on the pajamas. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite Fitesrm
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of this brand so we own several items. This T-shirt material became nubby after just one wear. More than satisfied with all of their other clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Haysenesi H.

customer_reviews.title: Great doggie pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable pj’s for the puppy. We have a short haired dog who really loves his pj’s at night to stay warm.
customer_reviews.author: G. Nance

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I have a 13 pound shih tzu and the large fits him perfectly. Im am glad I didn't get the medium, it would have been too small
customer_reviews.author: Ryleefay

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love fitwarm clothing! Wish they would make more summer clothes though!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!great quality, fast shipping and good service!!! Love love love the brand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 4 pound Yorkie perfectly. Very cute!! Arrived in less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Stretchy fits both our 3lb and 7lb dogs (size small )
customer_reviews.author: Greg Glover

customer_reviews.title: Better to not machine wash this
customer_reviews.text: Great product but get pills easily. And it was very streachy thin fabric.
customer_reviews.author: PPo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my dog. I use it for cool nights for my pom who has lost his hair.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and cozy
customer_reviews.text: A little thinner fabric than expected but fit a 9.5 lb Yorkie perfect. (13" from neck to bum, neck is about 14" around, and about 8" tall at the ahoulder) They work great under her snowsuit too.
customer_reviews.author: Rindy13

customer_reviews.title: but when it got cold outside he was glad to have them
customer_reviews.text: My cranky dog wasn't a fan of the legs at first, but when it got cold outside he was glad to have them. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Strong

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The jumper is cute and lightweight. I wish the material was a little softer for comfort but my puppy doesn't seem to mind. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cooper

customer_reviews.title: I have a tiny Pomeranian and this fit perfectly, ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a tiny Pomeranian and this fit perfectly, and she loves wearing it especially on the last few cold mornings we’ve had!
customer_reviews.author: Hey there

customer_reviews.title: A little small.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5lb toy poodle. Size medium was a little snug on her.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina Strange

customer_reviews.title: Odor
customer_reviews.text: This is the third item I have ordered from this company. Unfortunately it arrived with a horrible sour/musty odor, so I washed it...but it still has the same odor! Dissapointing. Hoping it will fade with some more washes.
customer_reviews.author: CL3

product_meta.title: Fitwarm Lightweight Knitted Comfy Pet Clothes for Dog Pajamas PJS Coat Jumpsuit Grey
feature_bullets: Made of soft and lightweight knitted fabric
Perfect for everydays wear, sleeping time and photos
Fashion dog clothes made of comfy fabric, keep your furry baby comfortable and fashionable
